name: The Factory (Hanna Andersson)
description:
Ohh noo, the industrial worker has fallen down, help him survive by not letting him fall down in the fire! 

Jump the boxes and see how long you can survive. 

Try beat the global highscore!

Controls

To move through the menu, use W or S and 1 to select.

Player 1

  • A - go left
  • D - go right
  • W - jump

Player 2

  • Left arrow - go left
  • Right arrow - go right
  • Up arrow - jump
